price: Ԑmma sε Nyankopͻn bεtwe wͻn aso wͻ aberε a wo (Nkͻmhyεni Muhammad) wo wͻ wͻn mu, na εmma nso sε Nyankopͻn bεtwe wͻn aso aberε a wͻresrε bͻnefakyε.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيُعَذِّبَهُمۡ وَأَنتَ فِيهِمۡۚ وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ مُعَذِّبَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ يَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna al-lahu liyuʿadhibahum wa-anta fīhim wamā kāna al-lahu muʿadhibahum wahum yastaghfirūna
